response.explain: The previous action code successfully moved the robot to the microwave. The next step is to open the microwave.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the bottom cabinet.
(2) Grasp the mug from the cabinet.
(3) Close the bottom cabinet.
(4) Move to the microwave.
(5) Open the microwave.
(6) Put the mug inside the microwave.
(7) Close the microwave.
(8) Turn on the microwave to heat the mug.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 5: Open the microwave
    microwave = registry(env, "microwave_bfbeeb_0")
    open(robot, microwave)
    donothing(env)
